drills.name: Soft Toss
drills.shortDescription: Basic hitting drill using side toss
drills.description: Player stands in hitting position while coach kneels to the side and tosses balls for the player to hit into a net. Focus on proper form and contact.
drills.whatToLookFor: Watch for proper hip rotation, level swing, and consistent contact point. Ensure the player keeps their head still and follows through.

drills.name: Rapid Fire Grounders
drills.description: Players line up while coach rapidly hits ground balls to different positions. Players must field cleanly and throw to first base.
drills.whatToLookFor: Proper fielding position, glove placement, and footwork. Watch for clean transfers and accurate throws.

drills.name: Sacrifice Bunt Progression
drills.description: Players practice bunting technique starting with no pitch, then soft toss, and finally live pitching. Focus on proper bat angle and ball placement.
drills.whatToLookFor: Proper pivot, bat angle, and ball control. Ensure players are using proper footwork and maintaining balance.
